title: 2020 May Day Interview With Noam Chomsky - Technology, Democracy, and Activism
description:
A great interview with a great thinker.


Topics Covered include May Day, Workplace Democracy, Ideology, Humor and politics, as well as the influence of Technology. I was super nervous, especially at the beginning but I hope it was valuable! 



People mentioned in the interview include Gar Alperovitz, Historian David Montgomery, David Noble, Bill Moyers, and the members of r/chomsky on Reddit. Great community for Chomsky fans!


 Hope you enjoy. Please like and subscribe.
